title: Python Quiz - Fundamentals
description:
This Quiz is for beginners who are new to Python Programming.
This quiz provides Multiple Choice Questions to get familiar with Python.
The quiz focuses on testing your basic skills in Python functions, string, operators, functions, set, and lists.

title: Introduction to Python & Computer Programming
description:
In this exam, you will learn about, 

  • Fundamentals of computer programming language
  • Compilation vs Interpretation
  • Introduction to Python
  • Python 2 vs Python 3
